name: Infinite Rave
description: Explosions, Gore, and Death by Fire and other messy things to go around in this simple looking but complex game. Play in a series of maps to see how long you can survive and how much money you’ll get. Upgrade your guns, switch costume mid game, and burn all the mobs you can.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 10 Processor: 1.6 Ghz Intel® Core™ i5 Processor Graphics: 1256 Intel(R) HD Graphics Family Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 10 Processor: 2.0 Ghz Intel® Core™ i7 Processor Graphics: 1256 Intel(R) HD Graphics Family Storage: 150 MB available space
